title: Immune Booster - A Guided Meditation to Support You During Sickness MP3 Download

Guided Meditation to Strengthen Your Immune System MP3 Download

Listen to a Sample Below

Immune Booster - Sample

Use this guided meditation anytime you are sick, have been exposed to a sickness, are worried you are going to get sick, or whenever you are going through a medical procedure. This guided meditation is designed to help strengthen your immune system and provide stress reduction. It is filled with positive ideas and imagery which speak directly to your subconscious mind to support healthy and strong immune function. Guided meditations are simple to do - just get comfortable sitting or lying down and listen. Headphones are recommended, but not required. Join the millions of people who use the proven technique of meditation to improve their lives.

Disclaimer: This product is not intended to replace medical advice or treatment. Do not listen to while operating heavy machinery.
